Posts.EditableText:
hi, i'm very new to all this and also a luddite, so very sorry if this is a stupid question. Is there anyway of imbedding my adventure straight in my blog?

cheers
Posts.HTML:
hi, i'm very new to all this and also a luddite, so very sorry if this is a stupid question. Is there anyway of imbedding my adventure straight in my blog?

cheers

Posts.EditableText:
Other than supplying a link that sends you to the game, I am not aware of a way to integrate the adventure into a blog, but perhaps someone here will be helpful.

...and 'luddite'.  I had to look that up.  =)  Nice word.
Posts.HTML:
Other than supplying a link that sends you to the game, I am not aware of a way to integrate the adventure into a blog, but perhaps someone here will be helpful.

...and 'luddite'. I had to look that up. =) Nice word.

Posts.EditableText: If you can add htlml code into your blockposts you could add an iframe calling the game url
Posts.HTML: If you can add htlml code into your blockposts you could add an iframe calling the game url
